title: J.VER Men's Dress Shirts Stretch Stain Shield Long Sleeve Solid Formal Shirt Business Casual Button Down Shirts
description: Stain Defense: Comfortable "smart" dress shirt, the cotton fabric is soft to the touch, special process makes the shirt waterproof, blocking stains still maintain good breathability

Flex and Design: The micro-stretch properties of the men's shirt fabric allow you to move more freely. Spread collar, button placket, adjustable cuffs for a classic look that flatters most body shapes

Occasion: Business/ Wedding/ Party/ Dating/ Office/ Nightclub, whether for formal occasions or daily casual, this mens dress shirt is a perfect choice; Pair it with a stylish tie or belt; an elegant suit or casual pants, and this shirt will complement you
Size: Our button down shirts are US regular fit tailoring style,a variety of sizes and colors for you to choose,please refer to the size chart to choose the size that suits you

Care Instructions: This mens button down shirts can be machine or hand washed in cold/warm water and cannot be bleached. Please note that the stain resistance of the shirts decreases with the number of washes
